title: At 'Edge' with Judith Wright
creator_credit: Solrun Hoaas and Sync or Swim Documentaries
brief_description: A study of Judith Wright, her poetry and her links with the Australian landscape - in particular her relation to her property of “Edge” in Mangarlowe, N.S.W. Filmed at “Edge” in the Half-moon Wildlife District and featuring Roger Pulvers as the interviewer. Suitable for middle and upper secondary level.
